title: Add short calendar page description under CalendarView heading

requirements.text: Update the CalendarView heading element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1] to include a short (one-sentence) description directly beneath the heading text, while keeping all changes confined to this selected h2 element.

quotes: add a brief description of what this calendar/page does just underneath this heading, keep it short
1. your choice, whatever you feel will be better.

acceptanceCriteria: The selected h2 renders a primary heading line and a second line of smaller, muted description text immediately beneath it.
The description is a single short English sentence explaining what the calendar/journey page does.
Only the selected h2 element is modified; no other layout elements (e.g., button placement/size) are changed in this build.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1].
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not implement the requested two-column header layout (left heading/description and right large Compare Progress button) in this build, since it would require editing elements outside the selected h2.
Do not change the Compare Progress button icon or sizing in this build.
